name: Lockbox - NaNoRenO '23 Project
description:
The playable browser version has NOT been optimized for mobile!

A short, kinetic visual novel about a jaded author meeting her creation. 🎀🕰️

Created for NaNoRenO 2023.

Credit:

  • Written by Mkei
  • Character Design by Mkei
  • Luminova's design by Mkei & Jed Dela Peña
  • Music & SFX by Kiba
  • Art, GUI & Programming by LisaW
  • Original BG by Colin + Meg at Unsplash, edited by LisaW
  • Title screen by Mkei, drawings in time capsule by Jed Dela Peña
  • Image by kues1 on Freepik
  • Font Kalam at Google Fonts
  • Title Font Courgette at Google Fonts
